---
title: "图标跟随背景变色"
date: 2021-09-24T17:10:46+08:00
draft: false
---

## 起因

使用hugo的博客搭建好了，目前使用的是[PaperMod](https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod/)主题，因为该主题自带图标比较少，我就自己上iconfont找了几个，但是我发现在黑夜模式下，图标不会像自带图标一样由黑变成白的。



## 解决办法

例如：bilibili小电视图标

* 白天模式：![](https://images.mua.blue/images/2021/09/25/zjI4Ls.png)

* 黑夜模式：![](https://images.mua.blue/images/2021/09/25/65iyhy.png)

  会看不清楚小电视。



修改前的代码：

```html
<svg t="1632470105372" class="icon" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <path d="M386.327273 437.527273h-4.654546l-125.672727 27.927272c-18.618182 4.654545-27.927273 18.618182-23.272727 37.236364v9.309091c4.654545 13.963636 13.963636 23.272727 27.927272 23.272727h4.654546l130.327273-23.272727c18.618182-4.654545 27.927273-18.618182 23.272727-37.236364V465.454545c-4.654545-13.963636-18.618182-27.927273-32.581818-27.927272zM414.254545 605.090909c-9.309091 0-18.618182 9.309091-18.618181 18.618182 0 18.618182 4.654545 37.236364 18.618181 51.2 13.963636 18.618182 32.581818 23.272727 51.2 23.272727 18.618182 0 32.581818-4.654545 46.545455-18.618182h9.309091c13.963636 13.963636 27.927273 18.618182 41.890909 18.618182 18.618182 0 27.927273-4.654545 41.890909-9.309091 23.272727-18.618182 32.581818-41.890909 32.581818-69.818182 0-4.654545 0-4.654545-4.654545-9.30909-9.309091-4.654545-13.963636-4.654545-23.272727-4.654546H605.090909c-9.309091 0-13.963636 9.309091-13.963636 18.618182s0 18.618182-9.309091 23.272727c-4.654545 9.309091-13.963636 13.963636-23.272727 13.963637s-13.963636-4.654545-23.272728-13.963637c-4.654545-9.309091-9.309091-18.618182-9.309091-27.927273 0-9.309091-9.309091-13.963636-18.618181-13.963636s-18.618182 4.654545-18.618182 13.963636v4.654546c0 9.309091-4.654545 23.272727-13.963637 27.927273-4.654545 4.654545-9.309091 4.654545-13.963636 4.654545-9.309091 0-13.963636-4.654545-23.272727-13.963636-4.654545-9.309091-9.309091-18.618182-9.309091-27.927273 4.654545-4.654545-4.654545-9.309091-13.963637-9.309091zM637.672727 437.527273c-13.963636 0-27.927273 9.309091-27.927272 23.272727v9.309091c-4.654545 18.618182 9.309091 32.581818 23.272727 37.236364l125.672727 23.272727h4.654546c13.963636 0 27.927273-9.309091 27.927272-23.272727v-9.309091c4.654545-18.618182-9.309091-32.581818-23.272727-37.236364l-125.672727-23.272727h-4.654546z" fill="" p-id="851">
    </path>
    <path d="M795.927273 325.818182c23.272727 0 41.890909 18.618182 41.890909 41.890909v400.290909c0 23.272727-18.618182 41.890909-41.890909 41.890909H228.072727c-23.272727 4.654545-41.890909-13.963636-41.890909-37.236364V367.709091c0-23.272727 18.618182-41.890909 41.890909-41.890909H795.927273m-65.163637-279.272727c-13.963636 0-27.927273 4.654545-37.236363 18.618181l-139.636364 190.836364h-55.854545L283.927273 125.672727c-4.654545-4.654545-13.963636-4.654545-23.272728-4.654545-13.963636 0-27.927273 4.654545-37.236363 18.618182-4.654545 9.309091-4.654545 23.272727-4.654546 37.236363 4.654545 9.309091 9.309091 23.272727 18.618182 27.927273L325.818182 256H228.072727c-60.509091 0-111.709091 51.2-111.709091 111.709091v400.290909c0 60.509091 51.2 111.709091 111.709091 111.709091H791.272727c60.509091 0 111.709091-51.2 111.709091-111.709091V367.709091c0-60.509091-51.2-111.709091-111.709091-111.709091h-130.327272l102.4-139.636364c13.963636-18.618182 9.309091-46.545455-9.309091-60.509091-4.654545-4.654545-13.963636-9.309091-23.272728-9.30909z" fill="" p-id="852">
    </path>
</svg>
```



修改后的代码：

```html
<svg t="1632470105372" class="icon" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"
```

修改后的效果：

* 白天模式：![](https://images.mua.blue/images/2021/09/25/pF0jJp.png)

* 黑夜模式：![](https://images.mua.blue/images/2021/09/25/g9BneA.png)
